name: native-promisify
description: convert callback function to promise only use native promise

scripts.test-cov: node node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- -R dot -t 50 test/*.js
scripts.test-travis: node node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R dot -t 50 test/*.js
